description: If Donald Trump keeps trying the patience of the judge presiding over his hush money trial, the former president could wind up back in his home New York City borough of Queens — specifically the prison on Rikers Island, experts said Monday.
title: Could Donald Trump really go to jail for gag order violations?

description: Palestinian civilians rushed to flee parts of Rafah on Monday after the Israeli military told some 100,000 people to leave the southern Gaza city, a possible signal that a long-feared ground offensive could be imminent with talks for a last-ditch truce deal stalled.
title: 'Where do we go?' Palestinians flee parts of Rafah as Israeli military order stokes fears ground assault could be imminent

description: Columbia will replace its universitywide commencement ceremony on May 15 with "smaller-scale, school-based celebrations," university officials announced Monday, after weeks of pro-Palestinian and counterprotests on campus.
title: Columbia cancels universitywide commencement ceremony after weeks of protests on campus

description: Kim Godwin is out after three tumultuous years as ABC News president, a move presaged earlier this year when network parent Walt Disney Co.
title: Kim Godwin out as ABC News president after 3 years as first Black woman to lead network news division

description: Longtime Trump aide Hope Hicks testified Friday, detailing the "crisis" that unfolded after the "Access Hollywood" video became public.
title: Judge threatens Trump with jail if he continues to violate gag order

description: Testimony will resume Monday morning in former President Donald Trump's hush money trial, following sometimes heated and sometimes emotional testimony from major witnesses last week.
title: Trump trial resumes after tense week of testimony

description: Caz Craffy got Gold Star families, survivors of military service members, to hand him their money, then banked huge commissions while making bad investments.
title: First these Army families lost their loved ones. Then the man assigned to help them took their money.

description: Boeing is finally set to launch two NASA astronauts to the International Space Station on its Starliner spacecraft, following years of delays and glitches.
title: In a high-stakes test, Boeing will launch NASA astronauts to space for the first time
